subject: Fwd: Thank you, we are ready to lend you some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your your credit report does not matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire NOW):
 
$238,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this plain form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://greenitsealthh.com/
